name: briar pocket cardigan
notes:
the briar cardigan is slouchy, oversized with loose wide sleeves and simple hemline ribbing. itâ€™s the perfect crochet cardi for chilly fall days as the relaxed fit allows you to wear heaps of layers underneath!this design also features two handy dandy pockets that fit a full-sized smartphone inside! worked up in half double, double, front and back post double crochet, the briar cardigan is a wonderful easy crochet cardigan pattern that is great for first time garment makers!

this pattern is accompanied by a video tutorial :slightly_smiling_face: 

sizes
xs(s, m, l, xl, 2xl, 3xl) 

skill level: easy
